title: Interview with Noam Chomsky - Is Obama Progressive?
description:
Cenk Uygur sits down for an interview with noted intellectual, linguist, cognitive scientist,  and political critic, Professor Noam Chomsky. The author of over 100 books brings his expertise in  war, politics, and mass media to explain why and how the modern political environment is the way it is. 

To see the full, in-depth interview between Noam Chomsky and Cenk Uygur on topics including President Obama, the rightward shift of politics, drone strikes, labor, and Aaron Shwartz , please visit http://www.youtube.com/tytinterviews

Full length interview here: http://youtu.be/CwRkfddtSPs
